= FAQs=

  * How do I report a defect or request an enhancement  
      Drop an email to rajiv.narula@gmail.com
  * Can I commit to the project. 
      Sure !!! Contact me and we can discuss further.
  * What all databases are supported. 
      Same as DBDeploy. ora, mysql, mssql, db2, syb-ase, hsql
  * Can I get this plugin the good old regular way ? i.e grails install-plugin dbdeploy. 
      Not yet. Maybe in future...
